title: Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Implemented code migration for a top 5 E-commerce platform in Ukraine from React.js 15 to React.js 18 by using an incremental migration strategy, resulting in a complete and accurate transition for millions of users.
Collaborated in an agile environment within a cross-functional team of 8 professionals, fostering efficient communication and teamwork while delivering successful features.
Leveraged Node.js and TypeScript to develop and test new REST API endpoints for the 'Favorites' category enabling efficient management of favorite items.
Maintained over 94% of code coverage by writing tests using Jest and React Testing Library.
Created 20+ components for the 'Favorites' feature using Material-UI, CSS (SASS), and Styled Components ensuring a stylish and responsive user interface.
Designed a 'Product Review' schema and model using MongoDB and Mongoose to enhance user engagement and feedback collection.
Utilized Git for version control and JIRA for project management on a daily basis.

title: Digital Marketing Manager
responsibilities: Increased student enrollment by 17% through the development of targeted marketing campaigns.
Generated 23% higher engagement rates by overseeing the creation of compelling content.
